name: wdk-starter-react-native-e2e
description: WDK Starter React Native E2E Tests

scripts.test:ios: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools && wdio run wdio.ios.conf.ts
scripts.test:android: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools && wdio run wdio.android.conf.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.build-apk: export JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v 21) && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH && cd .. && npx expo export --platform android --output-dir ./dist && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && echo "sdk.dir=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk" > android/local.properties && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../e2e/apps/app-release.apk
scripts.build-ios: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && cd .. && npx expo export --platform ios --output-dir ./dist && cp -r dist/_expo ios/ 2>/dev/null || true && RELEASE_APP=$(find ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData -name 'wdkstarterreactnative.app' -path '*/Release-iphonesimulator/*' -type d | head -1) && if [ -n "$RELEASE_APP" ]; then rm -rf e2e/apps/wdkstarterreactnative.app && cp -r "$RELEASE_APP" e2e/apps/wdkstarterreactnative.app && echo 'Copied existing Release build'; else echo 'No existing Release build found. Please run: npx expo run:ios --configuration Release first'; exit 1; fi
